column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Michelle - We thank you for your review
column2: and are happy to hear you enjoyed your meal with us. We appreciate your kind feedback
column3: though I'm a little confused. We do offer dine-in service at all eight of our Houston locations
column5: we do require guests wear a mask if they enter our establishments. To date
column6: I have not heard of any guests being "harassed" about our enforcement of the statewide-mask policy.
